comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to Evening Post, Rōrahi LXXXVIII, Putanga 52, 29 Hereturikōkā (new Zealand) 1914, Page 7 paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&d=EP... Members of French Council of War were Generals Castelnau, Gallieni, Archinard, Michel, Chomer, Joffrey, Laffon de Ladebat, de Largle de Cary, Dubail, and Sordet.
